title: BANDAIDE: Back and Neck Discomfort Relief with Altered Beliefs, Intelligent Posture, Dynamic Movement and Exercises
description: BANDAIDE, AKA Back and Neck Discomfort Relief with Altered Beliefs, Intelligent Posture, Dynamic Movement and Exercises, in the long-form. Self-management is the key to success in low back pain. Helping patients to overcome the fear of movement and build up the core muscles is the main strategy in low back pain.BANDAIDE is a brief book (22 pages) with 65 colourful illustrations. It is meant as a quick read but capable of providing a comprehensive understanding of back and neck disorders.
author: Dr George Ampat
